title: Multitude of issues with opening League of Legends
body:
OKAY. I am literally done with this.
First of all, lately i've spent a lot of money on this game recently, and after these events occurred, it makes me think that maybe this game isn't as reliable as I thought it was.

I decided I wanted to play Lissandra, which was a new Champ I got. When I got to the loading screen with all the cards, nothing was happening. Everything wasn't connected, so I restarted my computer multiple times. I decided to reinstall, but then an error kept on popping up when I was downloading the thing. I would have to restart the installer and it would pop back up at 33%. I uninstalled everything
EVERYTHING.
And now when I try to open up the game. The little LoL picture pops up, but nothing happens.

Please respond, I do love this game. But fix it.  {{champion:127}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
A lot of the areas where you're running into issues (loading screen, 33% during patching, launching) are indications that this is caused by an issue with your PC reaching our servers properly. I suggest taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a consolidated list of steps that should resolve this.

Let me know if this helped.
